requirements.summary: Redesign SellerDashboardPage to match the Shopify admin mobile screenshots with a mobile-first, responsive card/checklist hierarchy while preserving existing capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Seller dashboard uses a mobile-first layout resembling the screenshots (top dark bar + main content cards/checklist style), with consistent spacing and card styling.
Dashboard remains fully usable on desktop (responsive) without broken layout.
No regression to existing seller dashboard capabilities: viewing store, opening store settings, and adding products still work.

file_operations.description: Restructure the page into a mobile-first layout: internal dashboard-only top section + stacked onboarding cards + secondary sections (stats and product management) placed lower, ensuring existing actions (View Store, Store Settings, Add Product dialog) remain accessible and functional. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Button, Badge, Input) for consistent spacing/typography; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add small, dashboard-scoped utility classes (if needed) to support the screenshot-like hierarchy (e.g., subtle card shadows, section spacing) without changing existing global navigation behavior or editing immutable ui component files.

requirements.summary: Add a Seller Dashboard-only Shopify-admin-like internal dark top bar with menu icon, search input (visual-only), notifications icon, and circular badge placeholder without impacting the global Header.
acceptanceCriteria: SellerDashboardPage renders an internal dark top bar similar to the screenshots, independent of frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.
Search field is present visually; it may be non-functional (no backend/search feature required).
Icons and elements align correctly on common mobile widths (e.g., ~360px) without overflow.

file_operations.description: Create a dashboard-scoped top bar component that renders a dark header row with (1) menu icon button (no global nav side effects), (2) prominent search input (visual-only), (3) notifications icon button (visual-only), and (4) circular store/user badge placeholder. Use shadcn-ui Input/Button and lucide-react icons; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire SellerDashboardTopBar into the dashboard page (inside the page content, not the global header) and ensure the layout remains responsive (no overflow on ~360px widths). Use existing auth/queries and do not modify frontend/src/components/Header.tsx.

requirements.summary: Implement screenshot-like onboarding/checklist cards with CTAs wired to existing flows (/create-store navigation and ProductFormDialog) while keeping product management accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: A prominent ‘Add store name’ (or equivalent) section exists and navigates to /create-store.
An ‘Add product’ CTA exists and opens the existing ProductFormDialog (same functionality as current ‘Add Product’ button).
Existing product list/management UI remains accessible from the dashboard (it can be placed lower on the page or behind a section), including edit, delete, and quick stock update.

file_operations.description: Add a dashboard-only onboarding/checklist card stack that matches the screenshot pattern (headline + description + primary CTA, optional secondary link/button). Include: (1) Add store name/settings CTA navigating to /create-store, (2) Add your first product CTA calling a provided callback to open ProductFormDialog, and (3) additional informational-only setup cards styled consistently (no new backend features). Use shadcn-ui Card/Button; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire SellerDashboardOnboardingCards into the page and connect CTAs: store settings navigates to /create-store; add product opens existing ProductFormDialog via existing state. Ensure SellerProductList remains reachable (e.g., placed below onboarding section) and retains edit/delete/stock update functionality by keeping SellerProductList integration intact.

requirements.summary: Remove/avoid all visible ‘Shopify’ text in the Seller Dashboard UI and apply ‘Shanju’ branding where appropriate, with all user-facing text in English.
acceptanceCriteria: A UI text scan of SellerDashboardPage and any new dashboard-only components shows no visible ‘Shopify’ strings.
Any new branding labels shown in the dashboard use ‘Shanju’.
All newly added labels, headings, helper text, and button text are in English.

file_operations.description: Audit and update any dashboard-visible copy introduced or adjusted during the redesign to ensure no ‘Shopify’ appears and any needed branding reads ‘Shanju’, with all text in English.

Ensure any branding label/placeholder content rendered by the internal dashboard top bar uses ‘Shanju’ (if shown) and contains no ‘Shopify’ strings; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure all onboarding card titles/descriptions/CTAs are English-only and contain no ‘Shopify’ strings; use ‘Shanju’ where branding is needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
